languages.text: "Ресурсы {g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}Инквизиции{/g} не безграничны, и, к тому же, это не их юрисдикция. Тем не менее, дело деликатное и в высшей степени секретное. Оно напрямую касается вашей династии и ее давних договоренностей с Адептус Арбитес. Нам нужна именно ваша помощь".

"The {g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}Inquisition{/g}'s resources are not limitless, nor is this within their jurisdiction. The matter is delicate, however, and calls for the utmost secrecy. It is also intimately related to your dynasty and its ancient covenant with the Adeptus Arbites. We indeed require your personal assistance."
languages.original_text: "Ресурсы {g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}Инквизиции{/g} не безграничны, и, к тому же, это не их юрисдикция. Тем не менее, дело деликатное и в высшей степени секретное. Оно напрямую касается вашей династии и ее давних договоренностей с Адептус Арбитес. Нам нужна именно ваша помощь".

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}異端審問庁{/g}といえども、資源は無限ではないし、これは彼らの管轄でもありません。ですが、この件は非常に繊細で、最大限の機密保持が求められます。そしてこれは、あなたの王朝と高等裁定局との古き契約にも深く関わっているのです。私たちが求めているのは、まさしくあなたご自身の力なのです」
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}Inquisition{/g}'s resources are not limitless, nor is this within their jurisdiction. The matter is delicate, however, and calls for the utmost secrecy. It is also intimately related to your dynasty and its ancient covenant with the Adeptus Arbites. We indeed require your personal assistance."

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問庁といえども、資源は無限ではないし、これは彼らの管轄でもありません。ですが、この件は非常に繊細で、最大限の機密保持が求められます。そしてこれは、あなたの王朝と高等裁定局との古き契約にも深く関わっているのです。私たちが求めているのは、まさしくあなたご自身の力なのです」

languages.text: "Die Ressourcen der {g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}Inquisition{/g} sind nicht unbegrenzt, und diese Angelegenheit liegt auch gar nicht in ihrer Zuständigkeit. Sie ist jedoch delikat und erfordert höchste Geheimhaltung. Zudem ist sie eng mit Eurer Dynastie verbunden und mit deren uraltem Pakt mit dem Adeptus Arbites. Wir brauchen in der Tat Eure persönliche Unterstützung."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}Inquisition{/g}'s resources are not limitless, nor is this within their jurisdiction. The matter is delicate, however, and calls for the utmost secrecy. It is also intimately related to your dynasty and its ancient covenant with the Adeptus Arbites. We indeed require your personal assistance."

traits.locale_text: "Die Ressourcen der Inquisition sind nicht unbegrenzt, und diese Angelegenheit liegt auch gar nicht in ihrer Zuständigkeit. Sie ist jedoch delikat und erfordert höchste Geheimhaltung. Zudem ist sie eng mit Eurer Dynastie verbunden und mit deren uraltem Pakt mit dem Adeptus Arbites. Wir brauchen in der Tat Eure persönliche Unterstützung."

languages.text: « L'{g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}Inquisition{/g} ne dispose pas de ressources illimitées, et de toute manière, cette affaire n'est pas de son ressort. Elle est délicate, cependant, et nécessite la plus grande discrétion. Elle est aussi intimement liée à votre dynastie et à son pacte de longue date avec l'Adeptus Arbites. Voilà pourquoi nous avons besoin de votre assistance. »
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}Inquisition{/g}'s resources are not limitless, nor is this within their jurisdiction. The matter is delicate, however, and calls for the utmost secrecy. It is also intimately related to your dynasty and its ancient covenant with the Adeptus Arbites. We indeed require your personal assistance."

traits.locale_text: « L'Inquisition ne dispose pas de ressources illimitées, et de toute manière, cette affaire n'est pas de son ressort. Elle est délicate, cependant, et nécessite la plus grande discrétion. Elle est aussi intimement liée à votre dynastie et à son pacte de longue date avec l'Adeptus Arbites. Voilà pourquoi nous avons besoin de votre assistance. »

languages.text: «Los recursos de la {g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}Inquisición{/g} no son ilimitados, como tampoco lo es su jurisdicción. No obstante, se trata de un asunto delicado que precisa de la mayor discreción. También está íntimamente ligado a su dinastía y el pacto ancestral que le une al Adeptus Arbites. Solicitamos su asistencia personal».
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}Inquisition{/g}'s resources are not limitless, nor is this within their jurisdiction. The matter is delicate, however, and calls for the utmost secrecy. It is also intimately related to your dynasty and its ancient covenant with the Adeptus Arbites. We indeed require your personal assistance."

traits.locale_text: «Los recursos de la Inquisición no son ilimitados, como tampoco lo es su jurisdicción. No obstante, se trata de un asunto delicado que precisa de la mayor discreción. También está íntimamente ligado a su dinastía y el pacto ancestral que le une al Adeptus Arbites. Solicitamos su asistencia personal».

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}审判庭{/g}的资源并非无穷无尽，况且这件事情也不在他们的管辖范围之内。这件事情非常微妙，需要绝对保密。不仅如此，你的王朝与法务部很久以前就签订了盟约，我们确实很需要你的个人协助。”
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}Inquisition{/g}'s resources are not limitless, nor is this within their jurisdiction. The matter is delicate, however, and calls for the utmost secrecy. It is also intimately related to your dynasty and its ancient covenant with the Adeptus Arbites. We indeed require your personal assistance."

traits.locale_text: “审判庭的资源并非无穷无尽，况且这件事情也不在他们的管辖范围之内。这件事情非常微妙，需要绝对保密。不仅如此，你的王朝与法务部很久以前就签订了盟约，我们确实很需要你的个人协助。”

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}Engizisyon{/g}'un kaynakları sınırsız değil, kaldı ki bu konu onların yetki alanı dışında. Üstelik hassasiyet ve azami gizlilik gerektiriyor. Hanedanlığınız ve Adeptus Arbites ile olan kadim andıyla da yakından alakalı. Gerçekten de şahsi yardımınıza ihtiyacımız var."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:InquisitionGlossary}Inquisition{/g}'s resources are not limitless, nor is this within their jurisdiction. The matter is delicate, however, and calls for the utmost secrecy. It is also intimately related to your dynasty and its ancient covenant with the Adeptus Arbites. We indeed require your personal assistance."

traits.locale_text: "Engizisyon'un kaynakları sınırsız değil, kaldı ki bu konu onların yetki alanı dışında. Üstelik hassasiyet ve azami gizlilik gerektiriyor. Hanedanlığınız ve Adeptus Arbites ile olan kadim andıyla da yakından alakalı. Gerçekten de şahsi yardımınıza ihtiyacımız var.”
